稱收習近平美麗信件 特朗普：仍可同中國達成貿易協議
2019-05-10 HKT 00:50

中美將進行新一輪貿易談判，美國總統特朗普表示，收到國家主席習近平一封美麗的信件，仍然有可能同中國達成貿易協議。

較早前，商務部強調，反對單邊加徵關稅，貿易戰沒有贏家，中方希望與美方通過對話而不是單邊措施，解決問題。

Trump says deal with China is still possible, but tariffs are an 'excellent' alternative

President Donald Trump on Thursday said he has an "excellent" alternative to a possible trade deal with China, as Chinese officials are set to meet U.S. trade negotiators later in the evening in Washington.

"Our alternative is an excellent one," Trump told reporters at the White House.

Asked if he would speak with Chinese President Xi Jinping, Trump said, "Well, he just wrote me a beautiful letter, I just received it, and I'll probably speak to him by phone."

Kevin Breuninger | @KevinWilliamB
Published 26 Mins Ago Updated Moments Ago

【中美貿易戰】中美協議周五能否落地？ 官媒總編：機會率是零
21:58 2019/05/09

中國外交部表示，副總理劉鶴率領的中方代表團，已於今天離開北京，啟程前往美國華盛頓進行新一輪貿易談判。在美國發出關稅威脅下，官媒《環球時報》總編輯胡錫進在Twitter發文稱，了解談判的中方人士告訴他，中美能在周五（明天）前達成協議的可能性是零。

發文並稱，如果情況糟糕，雙方會否在周五之後繼續談判也是懸念。

而白宮表示，在美國於美東時間周五（10日）0時01分（本港時間明天中午12時01分）起，調高2,000億美元中國商品關稅率至25%前數小時，劉鶴將與美方貿易談判代表共進晚餐。

另外， 彭博社引述知情人士透露，美國總統特朗普（Donald Trump）和其貿易團隊周二（7日）在白宮激烈討論了這場貿易戰的後續舉措，財長姆欽（Steven Mnuchin）當時主張信任中方會帶來令人滿意的提議以達成協議。

知情人士表示，白宮得出的結論是，只有在雙方會談取得進展的情況下，特朗普才應該與劉鶴會面。同時，一位知情人士說，美國貿易代表萊特希澤（Robert Lighthizer）一直致電國會議員，知會他們為達不成協議做準備，並確認關稅加碼是鐵定之事。
https://china.hket.com/article/2347119/

彭博社引述知情人士透露，美國總統特朗普（Donald Trump）和其貿易團隊周二（7日）在白宮激烈討論了這場貿易戰的後續舉措，財長姆欽（Steven Mnuchin）當時主張信任中方會帶來令人滿意的提議以達成協議。

老母欽真係賣國仆街仔嚟

President Donald Trump said Thursday that he has an "excellent" alternative to a possible trade deal with China, as Chinese officials are set to meet U.S. trade negotiators later in the evening in Washington.

His comment helped stock indexes to recover from lost ground on fears that the U.S. would impose additional tariffs on Chinese goods at midnight. Before Trump's remarks Thursday afternoon, the Dow Jones Industrial Average had fallen to a low of more than 400 points.

"They'll see what they can do," Trump said of the Chinese delegation after an event at the White House about ending so-called surprise medical billing. "But our alternative is an excellent one."

"It's an alternative I've spoken about for years. We'll take in well over a hundred billion dollars a year. We never took in 10 cents from China," Trump said. "And I think it'll be a very strong day, frankly. But we'll see."

President Donald Trump said Thursday that he has an "excellent" alternative to a possible trade deal with China, as Chinese officials are set to meet U.S. trade negotiators later in the evening in Washington.

His comment helped stock indexes to recover from lost ground on fears that the U.S. would impose additional tariffs on Chinese goods at midnight. Before Trump's remarks Thursday afternoon, the Dow Jones Industrial Average had fallen to a low of more than 400 points.

"They'll see what they can do," Trump said of the Chinese delegation after an event at the White House about ending so-called surprise medical billing. "But our alternative is an excellent one."

quote.msg:
President Donald Trump said Thursday that he has an "excellent" alternative to a possible trade deal with China, as Chinese officials are set to meet U.S. trade negotiators later in the evening in Washington.

His comment helped stock indexes to recover from lost ground on fears that the U.S. would impose additional tariffs on Chinese goods at midnight. Before Trump's remarks Thursday afternoon, the Dow Jones Industrial Average had fallen to a low of more than 400 points.

"They'll see what they can do," Trump said of the Chinese delegation after an event at the White House about ending so-called surprise medical billing. "But our alternative is an excellent one."

"It's an alternative I've spoken about for years. We'll take in well over a hundred billion dollars a year. We never took in 10 cents from China," Trump said. "And I think it'll be a very strong day, frankly. But we'll see."

quote.msg:
彭博社引述知情人士透露，美國總統特朗普（Donald Trump）和其貿易團隊周二（7日）在白宮激烈討論了這場貿易戰的後續舉措，財長姆欽（Steven Mnuchin）當時主張信任中方會帶來令人滿意的提議以達成協議。

老母欽真係賣國仆街仔嚟

財長理經濟 依家侵侵咁做係會損害美國經濟 只不過中國肯撚定會傷過美國 但唔代表美國無損失
如果你嘅目的係要迫死中國 咁好簡單 咪一路打落去打到打仗為止
但若果你只係想減少貿易逆差 簽訂一啲對自己有利嘅拹議 就一定要同中國坐低傾
所以個財長都係做番自己份工應做嘅事

只係一部份啱，如果只係睇一時嘅經濟呢個財長未免太短視
依家貿易戰個重點其實唔係減少貿易逆差咁簡單（當然表面上係，亦都係理由，因為呢個亦係加關稅嘅前題）。成個貿戰嘅重點係要中國停止偷嘢同迫佢做返本來响wto應承咗做嘅嘢，即係真正開放市場。呢兩樣先係長遠解決問題嘅關鍵，而且佢哋係不斷強調。

replies.msg:
無話啱唔啱 無人話坐係白宮入面就要同一個思想立場
財長表達財長嘅建議 總統下達總統嘅決定 各司其職
美國不嬲好多元 有鷹有鴿有中間派 各派又有黨鞭傾deal
做到好大程度嘅和而不同 況且美國個個時代都會造個宿敵出嚟畀藉合自己侵佔他國嫁啦

同蘇聯玩太空 同中東玩油 同北韓玩核武 依家同中國玩貿易 美國都唔係啲咩好貨色 只不過佢好識揀啲更抵打嘅國家出嚟做藉口咁解
